title: Organizational Learning Strategies for Developing Ambidextrous Innovation Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of organizational operations and project management
context.additional_context: A training program focused on fostering innovation culture and enhancing knowledge management capabilities in project-based organizational settings for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Participants can design an agile-based knowledge management framework to facilitate organizational learning
Participants can apply three core strategies for fostering an innovation culture—growth mindset, leveraging existing competencies, and strengthening flexibility—in practical settings
Participants can develop an implementation plan that integrates exploratory and exploitative innovation in project-based environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
